selector.exact: Caulobothrium  anacolum sp. n.(Figs. 12-13, 19)DESCRIPTION (n = number of measurementsused): Strobila acraspedote, apolytic, 6.8-15.4mm long, composed of 13-32 (n = 30) pro-glottids.
